basicInfo.name: Jave
basicInfo.flavor: Once he came of age, Jave became the Ancient Dragon Knight and now rules over all of Dragon Ruins.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Burn chance becomes 50%.

Skill 1.name: Furious Descent
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Grants an additional 15% Damage Boost each time the number of targets is reduced by 1.
 - 45% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 150% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Draconic Fury
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 70% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Grants an additional 8% Damage Boost each time the number of targets is reduced by 1.
 - Each attack has a 40% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Burn chance becomes 55%.

Passive.name: Vengeful Armor
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Attack-Based Defense Boost. [Always Active]
 - 38% chance to do a Counterattack. [Always Active]
 - 3 Enemies When Counterattacking
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Attack-Based Defense max becomes 1375.
 - Increases Counterattack Damage: To 50% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Burn chance becomes 40%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Crowd Control Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Effect: Changes Burn into [Dragonflame], dealing damage equal to 120% of Attack every turn.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Spike, Rudy, Evan, hamburgers, sausages, kind people, ice
profile.dislikes: Dellons, salad, evil people, enemies, boredom

basicInfo.name: Jave
